pages.text: If you need a bit of color variety in your buildings, you can try using mud. While it isn't the most structurally sound, it does look nice.$(br2)Regular mud blocks will dry if they're not next to water. You can smelt dried mud blocks into hardened mud, which won't be affected by moisture.
$(o)Mud can also act as a basic form of soul sand, slowing down entities slightly as they travel across.
There are blast furnace recipes for these as well.
